level.text: Pursuant to § 514 of the Act (D.C. Official Code § 3-1205.14) the Board may restrict the license of any person as a condition of probation pursuant to § 514(c)(7) of the Act (D.C. Official Code § 3-1205.14(c)(7)).

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 35 DCR 945, 953 (February 12, 1988); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 51 DCR 6451 (June 25, 2004).
